新手康文啦
玩返一兩個月有返個習慣肯定左唔係三分鐘熱度先再去搵大場join
睇多d youtube 去康文練返好個form 去到大場都冇咁多人sell你，做都做得舒服d

in my.opinion gyms which open twenty fours a day are the best since the staff there don't sell you personal training sessions aggressively. My friend Keita has opened a gym. So far it's been a great success. The excellent quality gym and shower equipment is a crucial factor in the success of his gym. Of course customer service also plays a key role in the company's success. He asked if I could find a good manager for him. I said "I can't make any promises but I'll see what I can do" My friend Tomiko has an interview for a marketing director position in his company. Keita laid particular stress on the need for leadership qualities. He also stressed clear communication skill is a decisive factor in the outcome of the interview. The interview stresses her out. I said "don't stress over it. Just out your mind at ease" My brother too said "try not to stress too much about it. Set your mind at ease." My girlfriend said too "Rest easy. Don't stress yourself too much. Set your mind at rest" She quit her previous job because her colleague always bullied her and the salary was low. I said "I don't blame you for wanting to leave" Last week we had supper at her.place.Her elder brother got japanese homework to do. He said "I've got to do part A but I haven't got to do part b" He soaks up bee vocabularies and patterns very quickly. In the classes he soaks up everything the teacher says. When "fukushima" is a japanese word you should stress the second third and last syllables. But when it's an english word the stress is on the third syllable. When he reads a novel he's like a sponge and soaks up the story. If he encounters a computer problem he'll find jason who' an expert and will soak up the advice he offers. His younger brother has a piccolo exam next week. He said "after this exam I'll do eight eight next year or better still ill directly take the diploma exam" After chatting with him for a while in his room I said "I'd better leave you to get on with your practice"My brother said "I had better leave you to practise your exam pieces."My girlfriend said "I'll leave you to get on with it" His eldest brother went to meditate in his room after supper so I left him to himself. Some milk spilt down the walm onto the floor so Tomiko soaked it up with a dishcloth.His.sister booked a massage session. She asked "had I better leave my wallet on the nightstand?" I said "you'd better not leave it on the bedside table during your session as someone might steal it" My brother said "hadn't you better leave it in your locker so that its safe?" Recently Keita shouted at his sister and called her a liar due to a misunderstanding. I said "I can't believe you would say that to her" my brother said "I can't believe you said that" Keita will be giving a birthday party at his home tomorrow but alas I can't attend as I got work. When he invited me at first I said "I'll have to see" Happy birthday Keita! I'm sure your friends will join me in wishing you a very happy birthday. Last year he got a massage chair for my birthday.i remember I said "I can't believe you got me a massage chair"There's pageant of which thr final round will take place next month. I would think Aiko seems very likely to enter thr final round.
